https://tmrev.io/movie/606711-Boogie Man 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pbXa3w5BQSe3skIh1guw76rDiVM.jpg A British-Indian teenager struggles with his cultural heritage in modern-day London, falling for a white, 20-something actress/model during a 1970s-themed exhibition, and becoming obsessed with both her, the fashion and music of a seemingly more glamorous '70s era, all the while trying to keep his family's Indian traditionalism and the impending responsibilities of adulthood at bay. Boogie Man
